name: Dating under the Comet
description:
Dating under the Comet

A game by our team of three for Ludum Dare 50

Spend your time and money resources wisely to find a partner and level up your skills for now and in future generations.

Try to delay the comet impact for as many generations as you can.

  
Made with
  • GameMaker Studio 2
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • FL Studio
  • Spine
  • Club Mate and Love
